meanings.sent1: The lamp was overlighting the room, making it hard to relax.
meanings.sent2: The stadium was overlighting, causing some spectators to shield their eyes.
meanings.sent3: The overlighting in the classroom made it feel like a sunny day inside.
meanings.sent4: The city was overlighting with neon signs, creating a dazzling display.
meanings.sent5: The overlighting of the stage added a magical glow to the performance.

meanings.sent1: The headlights of the car were overlighting the road ahead.
meanings.sent2: The sun was overlighting, making it difficult to see without sunglasses.
meanings.sent3: The overlighting from the lighthouse guided ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent4: The stars were overlighting the night sky, twinkling brightly.
meanings.sent5: The overlighting moon cast a silvery glow over the landscape.

meanings.sent1: The delicate artwork was overlighting in the gallery, risking damage.
meanings.sent2: The plants were overlighting in the greenhouse, affecting their growth.
meanings.sent3: The overlighting of the photos made them appear washed out.
meanings.sent4: The room was overlighting, revealing every speck of dust on the furniture.
meanings.sent5: The overlighting of the display case faded the colors of the artifacts.
